data.title: Monday evening out with Friends
data.text:
Cold Beer and Cheeseburgers has delicious food and a great assortment of beers/drinks.  I was interested in a cider and the server gave me a vast array of choices.  I ended up with a Cider Boys Orange Cider.  It was exactly as she suggested.  

The burgers are always tasty.  My wife is not a fan or cheeseburgers but always gets one from Cold Beer and Cheeseburgers because she loves them so much.

data.title: A crummy restaurant in a sad city.
data.text: We asked a local cop where to grab a casual meal and she suggest this.  You'd think a place with cheeseburgers in it's name would serve a decent one---WRONG.  At least the beer was cold.

data.title: Hamburger Heaven
data.text: The menu has a great selection of hamburgers cheeseburgers and other type sandwiches they run a special everyday. Place is kind of small but roomy enough the service is good and the wait on food is fast. If you like burgers this is a place to go, our office goes there for lunch at least once a week.

data.title: Basic hamburgers & salads
data.text: They moved from Jefferson over to Second street downtown across from the Federal Building. It is a better location. I get the mushroom/swiss cheese burger a lot and one of the two chicken salads. One salad has grilled chicken breast over lettuce and the other is fried chicken strips that can be dipped in hot sauce- buffalo chicken salad. They give you a big salad. A group of us go there regularly and they know us and take good care of us at lunch time. Nothing fancy.

data.title: Poor quality
data.text: My burger was not cooked thoroughly, in fact it was almost blood red.  That's fine for steak but not for hamburger.  Had to return it to be recooked.  Came back overcooked and very dry.

data.title: Don't bother...
data.text: This is A DIVE! Local degenerates use the bathroom here to bathe in, I know, I witnessed it. It's also a low-income daycare and the place is unclean with a capital "U". If you're visiting Dayton, this is NOT a sports bar guys, it is NOT safe to take your family here...I can't stress this enough. If you must go, I suggest you do not go alone. Vagrant’s hangout in front of this place, pop in all the time, and are casing the customers not the place to rob. Get the point. The food? It's not even close to 5-Guys.

data.title: If you can find one..
data.text: I recommend these burgers and make an effort to stop and get one whenever we see this establishment. However, finding them is scarce now.

data.title: Good food
data.text: Food was good for bar food, the waiter we had was great.  Very laid back, high energy, and fun.  It is an inner city bar so be aware that you might see or here some random things,

data.title: As Advertised...
data.text:
Cold Beer?  Check!  Cheeseburgers?  Check!  The sign doesn't say anything about snappy, spotless decor.  Nothing mentioned about clean floors, great service or an outstanding view...

We were in on a Saturday night.  Not real busy and our group was seated immediately.  Cold Beer was delivered promptly - no problem.  As we quaffed, a few in the party got a better look around the place.  There was consideration of finishing the beers and leaving - several in the group were afraid to order food based upon the cleanliness (or lack there-of) of the dining area.  After a couple of the Cold Beers, the orders for Cheeseburgers began.  Nothing special but everyone in the group of 10 enjoyed what they ordered.  My burger was cooked exactly as I had requested and was quite tasty.  I would disagree with the reviewer who said the burgers taste like McDonalds... mine definitely tasted like beef!  While our server was not in a hurry or all that intuitive, we really wanted for nothing and it was rare that anyone had to wait too long to get their Cold Beer refilled!

Easy walk from the Crowne Plaza and Convention Center.  Looks like there is perhaps a bus stop outside the front door which can give the impression that there is a line or some kind of problem as the riders mill about waiting on their bus.  Our server did mention that there had been some gunshots out on the street late the night before.  Other than that news, we felt very comfortable making the walk to and from the hotel at night. (9 PM)

Decent meal, not expensive but the place could use a little TLC...

data.title: Like Mcdonalds
data.text: This place reminds me of a higher scale Mcdonalds.  The quality of food even tasted like Mcdonalds.  I like Mcdonalds don't get me wrong but when I go to a sit down restaurant I would like to have quality in food.

data.title: Not up to par
data.text: Beavercreek location is disappointing. Cheeseburger was mediocre with cold, dry bun and burger that wasn't much better. Visited at lunch time with 2 associates and we were 3 of only 5 there. Others must have gotten the word!!

data.title: Casual, good burgers
data.text: Located near the Crowne Plaza and the Convention Center, the restaurant has a wide selection of good hamburgers and o.k. casual food, in a casual sports bar atmosphere. Nothing fancy or romantic, but a good burger.

data.title: ok, close to motel
data.text: not safe a night, bad area. food was ok, nothing else close to hotel

data.title: adult like atmosphere
data.text: very good food very close to hotel and reasonably priced and good food

data.title: Good food, not so good area.
data.text: Don't go here after dark.  The clientele is rough enough when it's light out.  The food is pretty good, the beer isn't as cold as they claim it is, and they use generic ketchup.  The service staff is okay, but a little lax about refills and checking back with you once they leave your food.

data.title: Como su nombre: Hamburguesa queso y cerveza
data.text: Pasamos a ver que tal era y fue normaiito tirado para bueno. La cerveza bien fría y una buena hamburguesa. De estas hay una amplia variedad en la carta y parece que todas son buenas, pero sólo probamos tres, y valían la pena. Servicio rápido y gente simpática. Que mas se puede pedir!!
